mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.goodsid AS "goods.id", cg.name AS "goods.name", cg.big AS "goods.big.id", cuna.name AS "goods.big.name", cg.zong AS "goods.zong.id", cunb.name AS "goods.zong.name", cg.small AS "goods.small.id", cunc.name AS "goods.small.name", cg.sptp AS "goods.sptp", cg.sort AS "goods.sort", cg.bzq AS "goods.bzq", cg.spbm AS "goods.spbm", cg.bandsid AS "goods.bands.id", cb.name AS "goods.bands.name", cg.tm AS "goods.tm", cg.cd AS "goods.cd", cg.sccs AS "goods.sccs", cg.pzwh AS "goods.pzwh", cg.zjbgh AS "goods.zjbgh", cg.spxkz AS "goods.spxkz", cg.gycpxkz AS "goods.gycpxkz", cg.scxkz AS "goods.scxkz", cg.supplierid AS "goods.supplier.id", cs.name AS "goods.supplier.name", cg.gclassid AS "goods.gclass.id", cgc.name AS "goods.gclass.name", cg.uniid AS "goods.unit.id", cg.specid AS "goods.spec.id", csp.name AS "goods.spec.name", cg.cbj AS "goods.cbj", cg.sj AS "goods.sj", a.housid AS "house.id", ch.name AS "house.name", a.nub AS "nub", a.yjnub AS "yjnub", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"

LEFT JOIN c_goods cg ON a.goodsid=cg.id LEFT JOIN c_house ch ON a.housid=ch.id LEFT JOIN c_unit cuna ON cg.big=cuna.id LEFT JOIN c_unit cunb ON cg.zong=cunb.id LEFT JOIN c_unit cunc ON cg.small=cunc.id LEFT JOIN c_bands cb ON cg.bandsid=cb.id LEFT JOIN c_supplier cs ON cg.supplierid=cs.id LEFT JOIN c_gclass cgc ON cg.gclassid=cgc.id LEFT JOIN c_spec csp ON cg.specid=csp.id
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(a.nub) FROM c_hgoods a WHERE a.goodsid=#{goodsId}
SELECT a.nub FROM c_hgoods a WHERE a.housid=#{house.id} AND a.goodsid=#{goods.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO c_hgoods( id, goodsid, housid, nub, yjnub, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{goods.id}, #{house.id}, #{nub}, #{yjnub}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE c_hgoods SET goodsid = #{goods.id}, housid = #{house.id}, nub = #{nub}, yjnub = #{yjnub}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
